CSTutor.Model.Tutorial

Class EditTextButtons

  • java.lang.Object
    • CSTutor.Model.Tutorial.EditTextButtons

  • public abstract class EditTextButtons
extends java.lang.Object
    EditTextButtons comprise the toolbar that gives the authors or editors the ability to format text within any of the text input fields.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  EditTextButtons.FontColor
      Allows the font colors to be more easily distinguished

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int fontSize
      Determines what size font the tutorial's text should be
      (package private) java.lang.String fontStyle
      Identifies which of several font styles are used to format within the tutorial editor
      (package private) boolean isBold
      Determines if the font should be bold
      (package private) boolean isItalicized
      Determines if the font should be italicized
      (package private) boolean isUnderlined
      Determines if the font should be underlined

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EditTextButtons()
      The constructor initializes all fields to standard font: 12pt plain Arial.
